backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing booking management, user profiles, service rates, time slot availability, and image path configuration with authorization mixins for access control and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the Google Ads tracking tag replacement from AW-17968689708 to AW-17969512168 in frontend/index.html.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including pages, hooks, and UI elements describing their functionality and key features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components using OKLCH color space.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with Google Ads tracking tag (AW-17969512168), SEO meta tags, and site verification for Ceiling Pro false ceiling services.
frontend/public/googlea0b8f9f5757853f9.h: Google site verification file for domain ownership confirmation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, admin (/riyaz), and account pages, wrapped in QueryClientProvider with shared layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookingsTa: Admin table component displaying bookings sorted by creation date with CSV export functionality and enhanced error display for authorization failures.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImagesEdit: Admin interface for uploading and managing images including hero image, service cards, and gallery images with file validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/ServiceRat: Admin component for editing per-square-foot pricing for three services (POP & Gypsum, PVC, Wall Molding) using form inputs and BigInt conversion.
frontend/src/components/admin/TimeSlotsE: Admin component for toggling availability of four booking time slots (10am, 1pm, 4pm, 7pm) using switches.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: Empty file, likely a placeholder for admin authentication/authorization logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginF: Empty file, likely a placeholder for admin login form component.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Customer-facing booking form with fields for personal details, property type, service selection, date/time slot, and area; includes validation and success handling.
frontend/src/components/booking/bookingV: Validation logic for booking form fields including name, mobile number (Indian format), location, property type, service, date, time slot, and area.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Float: Fixed-position WhatsApp button that normalizes phone numbers and links to WhatsApp chat.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Stick: Mobile-only sticky bottom CTA button for triggering booking consultation.
frontend/src/components/estimate/Estimat: Live cost calculator that computes estimates based on area and selected service, with special handling for inspection-based services.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Site footer with company info, contact details, service list, and attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with logo, account navigation link, and call button displaying company phone number.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Marketing section displaying contact information (phone, email, service areas) in a three-column grid layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Galler: Displays a before/after gallery section with default or custom images arranged in a 2-column grid. Accepts optional galleryImages prop to override default before/after images.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Hero section component with background image, headline, pricing tagline, and CTA buttons for booking consultation and calling. Accepts optional custom hero image path.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HowItW: Displays a 3-step process section (Book, Site Visit, Installation) with icons and descriptions in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Review: Shows customer reviews in a 3-column card grid with star ratings, review text, and customer name/location.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Reusable section wrapper component with optional scroll-reveal animation, variant styling (white/grey), and container layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Displays service cards in a 4-column grid with images, pricing, descriptions, and Book Now buttons. Supports custom service images with fallback handling and prefills booking form on click.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhyCho: Shows three reasons to choose the service (Affordable, Skilled Experts, On-Time Delivery) in a centered 3-column grid with check icons.
frontend/src/config/ceilingPro.ts: Configuration object containing contact information (phone, WhatsApp, email) for Ceiling Pro business.
frontend/src/context/AdminAuthContext.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for admin authentication context provider.
frontend/src/domain/services.ts: Defines service catalog with 4 ceiling services (POP/Gypsum, PVC, Wall Molding, Gypsum Repair) including pricing, descriptions, and image paths. Includes helper function to get service rates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication. Initializes access control with admin token and invalidates dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: React Query hook that creates anonymous backend actor for admin dashboard (/riyaz) with hardcoded 'caffeine' admin token for access control initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for admin authentication hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all bookings (admin), user's bookings, and creating new bookings via backend actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useImagePaths.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and update image paths for hero, service cards, and gallery images, converting backend StoredImage objects to direct URLs for rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageUpload.ts: Provides React Query mutation hooks for uploading single or multiple images with validation (type, size), progress tracking, and automatic path generation using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider with AuthClient integration, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: React Query hook that checks if the current caller has admin privileges by querying the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to trigger visibility state when an element scrolls into view, respecting prefers-reduced-motion.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceRates.ts: React Query hooks to fetch and update service rates (popGypsum, pvc, wallMolding) with default fallback values.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimeSlotAvailabili: React Query hooks to fetch and update availability status for four daily time slots (10am, 1pm, 4pm, 7pm).
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks to fetch and save the current caller's user profile with proper loading state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors, typography, and responsive spacing utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Account management page displaying login prompt for unauthenticated users, profile setup for new users, and profile/bookings view for authenticated users with logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that renders sections for managing website images, service rates, time slot availability, and viewing all bookings.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main homepage component that renders all marketing sections (hero, services, calculator, booking, gallery, reviews, contact) with scroll-to-booking functionality and image path integration.
frontend/src/state/bookingPrefill.ts: Zustand store for managing preselected service state in the booking flow, allowing services to be pre-filled from other sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme with animations, typography, and container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project state document defining the Ceiling Pro booking website requirements, architectural decisions (no-password admin at /riyaz, fixed time slots, mobile-first), and known issues with bookings, admin access, and Google Search Console verification.
